CANVAS SHOPPER WITH 'TEAPOT VINTAGE' LOGO

CONDITION: NEW

N.B. THESE ITEMS ARE MERCHANDISE OF TEAPOT VINTAGE. THE ARE NOT SECOND HAND/VINTAGE

BAG MEASURES 15' X 15'

HANDLES MEASURE 28' (14' FROM TOP OF BAG TO TOP OF SHOULDER)
